unnormalised: Guys, auto market's buzzing with launches! Mahindra's rolled out the 'Scorpio N Adventure Edition' – rugged looks, more off-road kit. Perfect for those Leh-Ladakh trips, eh?
normalised: Guys, auto market's buzzing with launches! Mahindra's rolled out the 'Scorpio N Adventure Edition' – rugged looks, more off-road kit. Perfect for those Leh-Ladakh trips, eh?

unnormalised: Then, Tata's dropped the bombshell - Altroz EV finally hitting showrooms next month! Claiming a 350km range, should give Nexon EV some serious competition. Dr. Sharma from ARAI gave it a thumbs up!
normalised: Then, Tata's dropped the bombshell - Altroz E V finally hitting showrooms next month! Claiming a three hundred and fifty kilometer range, should give Nexon E V some serious competition. Doctor Sharma from A R A I gave it a thumbs up!

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki's sneaking in a Baleno facelift, mainly cosmetic tweaks, but hey, new colours are always welcome! Price bump expected, around Rs. 20,000-30,000 maybe?
normalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki's sneaking in a Baleno facelift, mainly cosmetic tweaks, but hey, new colors are always welcome! Price bump expected, around rupee twenty thousand to thirty thousand maybe?

unnormalised: Heard rumors Hyundai's planning a Creta rivaling SUV, codenamed 'CX1'. Expected to be spacious, maybe 600 sq ft boot space! Diwali launch, anyone?
normalised: Heard rumors Hyundai's planning a Creta rivaling S U V, codenamed 'C X one'. Expected to be spacious, maybe six hundred square feet boot space! Diwali launch, anyone?

unnormalised: And finally, TVS is teasing a new Apache variant. More details soon, they say! Keep your eyes peeled! This festive season is going to be a car-nival!
normalised: And finally, T V S is teasing a new Apache variant. More details soon, they say! Keep your eyes peeled! This festive season is going to be a car-nival!
